wikipedia_page.main: Francis Dods (23 February 1879 – 29 June 1910) was a Scottish rugby union player.He was capped once for Scotland in 1901. He also played for Edinburgh Academicals.He was the brother of John Dods who was also capped for Scotland.

response: John Henry "Harry" Dods (30 September 1875 – 30 December 1915) was a Scottish rugby union player. He was capped eight times for  between 1895 and 1897. He also played for Edinburgh Academicals. He was the brother of Francis Dods who was also capped for Scotland.
